metadata.name: Fraktional
metadata.description:
The next part of the "Masters of the Metaverse" series: "Fraktional". An homage to one of the most genuine, amazing humans, group of humans or artificial intelligence I've had the pleasure of knowing - @pak.

Distinct, rebellious and genius like Banksy. Cheeky like Murakami. Craftsmanship like Frank Stella. He who made burning stuff valuable and redefined what it is to own something.

I thought it would only be fitting to juxtaposition the concept of "ownership" and "small pieces merge to a greater whole" to the rage and addiction that NFTs are and the idea of fractionalizing art/assets. Intermixed with some personal demons and the pleasure of being able to help @pak with some of his projects - even in a very small way. This piece has many layers and hits very close to home.
